snippet.title: Sling-A-Thing - (Game) Director's Cut
snippet.description:
Sling-A-Thing is a puzzle action game that combines humor, surprising challenges and varied gameplay to create a memorable experience. 
We’ve poured our hearts into crafting the game for the last three years and we would be thrilled if you could give our demo (~1h playtime) a try.

You can wishlist the game and download the demo here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1304530/SlingAThing/
some graphics you can use:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/h7k2uwyop7mlgy5bftmzv/AHB8sBSL2s08aSLsd57zCmU?rlkey=7pqevmknqyjl9k987q98r9qe4&dl=0
